channel.title: Your favorite character job
channel.description: :freeman:The game had many characters with jobs important and unimportant job. Which do you prefer 1.The security gaurd:pirate: 2.Scientist:zip: 3.Gordan freemans job to test:freeman: 4.Gordan freemans job to save facilty(probably willl be chosen):freeman: 5.Corrupt Goverment:fffuuu: 6. ANYthing else you can find> :frowning:

item.title: Your favorite character job
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
Neon Impulse:

So you wouldn’t like to be soldier and miss all the action?

Less chance of getting crowbarred, this way.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite character job
item.dc:creator: Neon_Impulse
item.description:
Pettifogg:

Perhaps she teleported? After all, we know there’s one in the Citadel because she and Eli went there from Nova Prospekt, and it wouldn’t be too much of a stretch of the imagination to assume there’s ones in White Forest and wherever the Arctic base is. That would also go some way to explaining why Eli doesn’t really know what she’s up to. She could have quickly sent him to White Forest first and then gone off to search for the Borealis.

Back on topic: I choose the Overwatch Dispatcher (assuming we’re allowed ones from HL2). You’d get to sit around all day telling soldiers to expunge people.

So you wouldn’t like to be soldier and miss all the action?

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite character job
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
Chrillen:

Any rebel base with the required vehicle to take her to the arctic then. I doubt they’re scattered all over the place.

And I suspect a base like that must be somewhere out of the city, for it to go unnoticed by the Combine.

It doesn’t matter really, she’s still surprisingly fast.

Perhaps she teleported? After all, we know there’s one in the Citadel because she and Eli went there from Nova Prospekt, and it wouldn’t be too much of a stretch of the imagination to assume there’s ones in White Forest and wherever the Arctic base is. That would also go some way to explaining why Eli doesn’t really know what she’s up to. She could have quickly sent him to White Forest first and then gone off to search for the Borealis.

Back on topic: I choose the Overwatch Dispatcher (assuming we’re allowed ones from HL2). You’d get to sit around all day telling soldiers to expunge people.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite character job
item.dc:creator: taxi_evil
item.description:
The bloke who spends all day thinking up new ways to dispose of rubbish. More thumpers! And burn it while you’re there!

item.title: Your favorite character job
item.dc:creator: DarkBabe
item.description:
Hmm…I suppose I’d want to be a small time scientist, this way the blame of the resonance cascade would not be my fault at all!

Or maybe just a pinch. :meh:

baconeggs:

Until Otis shoves his fist in you. :fffuuu:

item.title: Your favorite character job
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Also, you have no idea exactly how long you’re buried under the rubble for between HL2 and Episode 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite character job
item.dc:creator: Chrillen
item.description:
raw_bean:

No-one ever says she was in White Forest.

Any rebel base with the required vehicle to take her to the arctic then. I doubt they’re scattered all over the place.

And I suspect a base like that must be somewhere out of the city, for it to go unnoticed by the Combine.

It doesn’t matter really, she’s still surprisingly fast.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite character job
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Chrillen:

She’s an incredibly fast woman.

She manages to leave a citadel full of Combine soldiers while carrying a one legged man, then she leaves the city which is also crammed full of Combine soldiers, then she travels all the way to the White Forest base trough the outland, which is also full of Combine soldiers, then she flies all the way to the north pole AND finds Borealis. All that before Gordon even wakes up.

The Combine should have kept her.

No-one ever says she was in White Forest.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite character job
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
Neon Impulse:

I’d want to be a vending machine, definably. I’d get paid to crap candy! sigh that would be the life…

Until Otis shoves his fist in you. :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite character job
item.dc:creator: Chrillen
item.description:
Dias:

Who said she dies in episode 3? She could very well have died before episode 1 began. What with the recording and all.

She’s an incredibly fast woman.

She manages to leave a citadel full of Combine soldiers while carrying a one legged man, then she leaves the city which is also crammed full of Combine soldiers, then she travels all the way to the White Forest base trough the outland, which is also full of Combine soldiers, then she flies all the way to the north pole AND finds Borealis. All that before Gordon even wakes up.

The Combine should have kept her.

Read full topic
